titleStmt.title: Truths plea for infants, or, Infants right vindicated in a reply to Jeremiah Ives, chees-munger concerning the baptisme of infants. By Alexander Kellie.
titleStmt.author: Kellie, Alexander.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.R. and are to be sold by Nath. Brooks at the Angel in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Ives, Jeremiah. Infants baptism disproved and believers baptism proved.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
